thread.title: 'I wish I could turn back the clock... I feel very guilty' - Student apologises

title: 'I wish I could turn back the clock... I feel very guilty' - Student apologises
text: 'I wish I could turn back the clock... I feel very guilty' - Student apologises Independent.ie "I wish I could turn back the clock and that this never happened... I would do anything to replace their lives. I feel very guilty." http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/courts/i-wish-i-could-turn-back-the-clock-i-feel-very-guilty-student-apologises-35456332.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35245638.ece/f75a7/AUTOCROP/h342/page30_gleeson.jpg Learner driver Susan Gleeson wept in court as she apologised to the Clancy family Photo: Daragh McSweeney/Provision Geraldine Clancy and her daughter Louise Ann Clancy "I wish I could turn back the clock and that this never happened... I would do anything to replace their lives. I feel very guilty." Share 'I wish I could turn back the clock...
